# Flxtra Browser

Privacy-first web browser built in Rust.

## Running

Double-click `Flxtra.exe` to launch the browser.

## Features

- ğŸ›¡ Built-in ad blocker (50+ domains)
- ğŸ”’ HTTPS-only with auto-upgrade
- ğŸŒ DNS-over-HTTPS (Cloudflare)
- ğŸ“‘ Tab management
- ğŸ”— Navigation (Back, Forward, Refresh, Home)
- ğŸ¨ Dark theme UI

## System Requirements

- Windows 10/11
- No additional dependencies required

## Build from Source

```powershell
cd d:\fyeshi\project\OS
cargo build --release
```

The executable will be at `target\release\Flxtra.exe`
